metadata.title: CVE-2024-50246 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Add rough attr alloc_size check

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1009.10').
